title: PHONOVECTRA (logo typeface)
content:
Hi Typophiles

I need to ID this logotype? Anyone…

Condensed for sure!

Best Regards.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20060821185944/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%202_25.png) | 7.39 KB |
author: jaksi

comments.content:
‘ [Garage Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20060821185944/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/GarageGothic)’, by [Tobias Frere-Jones](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Tobias%20Frere-Jones).

_( A nice alternate may be ‘ [Van Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20060821185944/http:/www.vanarchiv.com/van.html)’, by [Ricardo Santos](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Ricardo%20Santos). )_

Dav
